name: obsidian-scrippets
description: Run and manage custom JavaScript scrippets from your vault.

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.prepublish:assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(!fs.existsSync('main.js')){process.exitCode=1;throw new Error('Run npm run build first');}"
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run release:tag --
scripts.release:tag: node -e "const v=process.argv[1]; if(!v){throw new Error('Usage: npm run release -- X.Y.Z');} process.exit(0)" && npm version
scripts.release:push: git push origin HEAD:main && git push --tags
scripts.release:all: npm run release -- $npm_config_ver && npm run release:push && npm run release:publish
